title: Harnessing Large Language Models for Automated Software Testing: A Leap Towards Scalable Test Case Generation
data:
S Rehan, B Al-Bander, A Al-Said Ahmad\xc2\xa0- Electronics, 2025
Software testing is critical for ensuring software reliability, with test case generation 
often being resource-intensive and time-consuming. This study leverages the Llama-
2 large language model (LLM) to automate unit test generation for Java focal 
methods, demonstrating the potential of AI-driven approaches to optimize software 
testing workflows. Our work leverages focal methods to prioritize critical components 
of the code to produce more context-sensitive and scalable test cases. The dataset\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\xa6
